name: Sabotage (orange08)
description:
Sabotage is a stealth game where your goal is destroy the enemy power core. Important info: Walking into an enemy will automatically activate a stabbing attack, Press the down key next to bodies to pick them up or set them down. There is only one level presently.

The game takes a lot of inspiration from "Killman Master" another small prototype by Daniel Remar. Enjoy!

Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD to move. Down button to pick up/set down bodies, Down button is also used to place explosives. Escape to exit, use Enter to select options on the menu.
